name: MAINEHEALTH
description: Not-for-profit family of providers and health care organizations and delivery networks.
sampleDescriptions: Infrastructure funding to expand health care facilities.
Lobby for appropriations funding for hospital infrastructure on House Infrastructure bill, H.R. 2, Moving Forward Act.
On S.178, we lobbied for the inclusion of infrastructure grant funding for tertiary care facilities with high numbers of COVID-19 patients and to further public health emergency preparedness.
